blessings.description: Improve your Team's Max Vibes by 15%
blessings.title: Solidarity

blessings.description: Improve your Team's Min Vibes by 15%
blessings.title: Same Page

blessings.description: Impair your Division opponents' Max Vibes by 7%
blessings.title: Getting in Their Heads (Literally)

blessings.description: Just asking questions. Impair your Division opponents' Min Vibes by 7%
blessings.title: Questioning Their Every Decision

blessings.description: Vision of things to come. Improve 3 random hitters on your team by one Star (20%)
blessings.title: Precognition

blessings.description: Improve 3 random pitchers on your team by one Star (20%)
blessings.title: Extra Elbows

blessings.description: Is good offense. Swap your best hitting pitcher into your lineup.
blessings.title: The Best Defense

blessings.description: Is good defense. Swap your best pitching hitter into your rotation.
blessings.title: The Best Offense

blessings.description: Praxis. Swap the positions of your worst hitter and worst pitcher.
blessings.title: Mutual Aid

blessings.description: Maybe try throwing with the other one? Team pitching changes anywhere from -5% to +15%
blessings.title: Non-Dominant Arms

blessings.description: Item. A random player on your team gets improved Baserunning and Defense.
blessings.title: Grappling Hook

blessings.description: Item. A random player on your team becomes BIG. Increased Power, Max Vibe. Decreased Baserunning.
blessings.title: Mushroom

blessings.description: The Wind can be Evil. Run. +15% Team Baserunning
blessings.title: Evil Wind Sprints

decrees.description: Randomize the stats of one hitter and one pitcher on every team.
decrees.title: Alternate Reality

decrees.description: Five Players from the Hades Tigers will be Randomly Distributed throughout the League.
decrees.title: Tame the Tigers

decrees.description: The Top 4 Teams will gain the Shame Pit punishment for next season. When they're shamed, they'll start the next game with negative runs equal to their shame.
decrees.title: Shame Pit

decrees.description: The Bottom 4 Teams will gain Home Field Advantage for next season. They'll start their homes games with 1 run.
decrees.title: Home Field Advantage

decrees.description: The Bottom 4 Teams from each Season will gain the Fourth Strike for the next Season. It will take four strikes to strike out any of their batters.
decrees.title: The Fourth Strike
